titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a flood control project for Carter Lake, Nebraska.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from Army, OMB.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to construct a flood control diversion project for Carter Lake, Nebraska. Provides that the Federal share of the cost of this project will be 75 percent.
